input.activity_signal: Active company website found via search (invoxio.com) showing "The Phone Company for Developers" with current copyright "© 2026 Invoxio Inc." LinkedIn profile with 22 followers indicating ongoing presence. BBB business profile and ZoomInfo listing showing Fort Myers, FL location with ~$4M revenue and 12 employees.
input.product_summary: Invoxio provides carrier-grade voice, messaging, and data APIs for developers, offering turnkey phone systems and enterprise solutions that scale from small teams to large call centers.
